channel.title: *[508]ITEMS won't equip?[508]*
channel.description:
Source: DavidScape..
ok so some of the items won't equip..is that because they are not assigned in the source as a bodyn, platelegs, helm or anything? just asking post!

item.title: *[508]ITEMS won't equip?[508]*
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yes, it is true.

Solving:

  1. Goto DavidScape -> io -> packets -> equipment.java
  2. Open it, and scroll down a tiny bit, until you see a huge list of items, organised by type.
  3. Find the type of item you are looking to add (EX: for toy kite, search “weapon”)
  4. At the end of that list, and a comma (like the rest) and put the name of the item CASE SENSITIVE In quotes.
  5. Compile, and restart server.

(if any errors, compiling or server-side, post a pic)

Read full topic
